label: Women's Accessories
description: When your clothes are a vibe but there’s potench for more, enter our edit of women’s accessories for that final touch. From cat-eye sunglasses to crisp-white caps and essential jewellery, these little things can really bring your look to another level. Find your new cross-body bag under LOVE Moschino or aim higher (read: your updo) with women’s hair accessories from ASOS DESIGN. We’re talking swirly scrunchies, bow headbands and more super-cute, 90s-inspired bits. And to wrap up things up, check out Pieces for women’s hat and scarf sets that’ll make cold-weather dressing a breeze
